fn.p: Edited by: Jason Kindrachuk, University of Manitoba, Canada
Reviewed by: Mary L. Kraft, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, United States; Miguel A. Martín-Acebes, Instituto Nacional de Investigación y Tecnología Agraria y Alimentaria (INIA), Spain
This article was submitted to Virology, a section of the journal Frontiers in Microbiology
